item.title: Organizing Your Azure Resources with Management Groups
item.description: Azure Management Groups are a powerful tool for organizing and managing your Azure resources. They allow you to create a hierarchical structure that can be used to apply consistent policies, access controls, and governance across multiple Azure subscriptions. In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of creating a new management group using the Azure Portal. Management groups are containers that help you manage access, policy, and compliance across multiple Azure subscriptions.
